title: Ooltewah High School
text:
Ooltewah High School (OHS) is a public high school located in <a href="Ooltewah%2C%20Tennessee">Ooltewah</a>, <a href="Tennessee">Tennessee</a>, near <a href="Chattanooga%2C%20Tennessee">Chattanooga</a>. It is part of the <a href="Hamilton%20County%20Schools">Hamilton County Schools</a> system.
Academics.
Ooltewah High School offers <a href="advanced%20placement">advanced placement</a> (AP) courses and an <a href="international%20baccalaureate">international baccalaureate</a> (IB) program.
Athletics.
The school competes in the <a href="Tennessee%20Secondary%20School%20Athletic%20Association">Tennessee Secondary School Athletic Association</a> (TSSAA). Its mascot is the <a href="Owl">Owl</a>. Sports include <a href="baseball">baseball</a>, <a href="basketball">basketball</a>, <a href="American%20football">football</a>, girls' <a href="golf">golf</a>, <a href="soccer">soccer</a>, <a href="Ultimate%20%28sport%29">ultimate frisbee</a>, <a href="softball">softball</a>, <a href="tennis">tennis</a>, <a href="track%20and%20field">track and field</a>,
<a href="volleyball">volleyball</a>, <a href="lacrosse">lacrosse</a> and <a href="wrestling">wrestling</a>.
2015 incident.
In December 2015 several members of the basketball team arrived in <a href="Gatlinburg%2C%20Tennessee">Gatlinburg, Tennessee</a> for a tournament. On the night of December 19, several older members dunked four freshman players in a hot tub. The next night, older players began poking <a href="pool%20cue">pool cue</a>s in four of the freshmen's <a href="rectum">rectum</a>s. Three nights later, one freshman player was assaulted in the rectum, and required emergency surgery. The following January, the school's basketball season was cancelled, and in August 2016, all three defendants were found guilty of aggravated rape and assault. The event made national news.
